thread.title: Customer Lory Molino
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by Customer Lory Molino

author: Customer Lory Molino
title: Customer Lory Molino
text: Thank you for such an easy rapid way to make a reservation. I made a reservation for my brother and his family to stay at your service hotel even though I am several states away and I am grateful for the convenience and ease in which I was able to do this for my brother.
